Articles.Content:
Hello, dear Kerbonauts!

I'm a fairly recent player (started with 1.0) and I have already more than 600h on this amazing game. It's simply the most addicting and imaginative game I've played years.

I've been a lurker on these forums for more than a year now and I've decided to be more involved with this great community.

Cheers,

Hello SirCharizrd17 and welcome to the KSP Forums!

Thanks for joining in and getting involved.  I look forward to seeing you around.


Happy landings!
